meanings.definition: A government or state in which those in power exploit national resources and steal money for personal gain.
meanings.sent1: The kleptocracy in the country led to widespread poverty among the citizens.
meanings.sent2: The citizens protested against the corrupt kleptocracy that was draining the nation's wealth.
meanings.sent3: The kleptocracy was so greedy, they even stole from each other!
meanings.sent4: The kleptocracy's grip on power was like a black hole, sucking in all the wealth of the nation.
meanings.sent5: The image of the kleptocracy was like a dark cloud hanging over the country.

meanings.sent1: The wealthy elite formed a kleptocracy that plundered the nation's riches.
meanings.sent2: The history books were filled with tales of the ruthless kleptocracy that ruled with an iron fist.
meanings.sent3: The kleptocracy's meetings were like gatherings of cunning foxes planning their next heist.
meanings.sent4: The shadow of the kleptocracy loomed large over the impoverished masses.
meanings.sent5: The legacy of the kleptocracy was a scar on the nation's history.
